author: Falcon_Knight
title: Promotion
review:
I got this set by accident, along with the Ice Cream Stand.

Box/Instructions

There's a polybag and a little baking "make your cake" picture at the end.

…

Parts

Lots of nice cake pieces, along with a glass cover. Quality lego pieces


The build

Putting a few bricks together, so not much. Gives you some baking ideas though.


…

The completed model

A few cakes, you need some other sets to play with it.

…

Summary

I hope you enjoyed this review, it took a while to come up with something to say

…
